boss_ultimate.name: Cataclysmic Strike

dragon_roar.name: Dragon's Roar
dragon_roar.description: A thunderous roar that weakens the opponent.

infernal_eruption.name: Infernal Eruption
infernal_eruption.description: A burst of demonic fire that burns the target.

warrior.name: Earthsplitter
warrior.flavor: The warrior slams the ground with earth‑shattering force!
